properties.name: org.techbd.service.http.hub.prime.version
properties.description: The active version, injected from pom.xml in application.properties via @project.version@

properties.name: org.techbd.service.http.hub.prime.default-sdoh-fhir-profile-url
properties.description: The default FHIR Profile used for principal validation of SDoH data

properties.name: org.techbd.service.http.interactions.default-persist-strategy
properties.description: Default persistence strategy for all HTTP request/response JSON content.

properties.name: org.techbd.udi.prime.jdbc.driver-class-name
properties.description: The UDI primary JDBC Driver Class Name

properties.name: org.techbd.udi.prime.jdbc.url
properties.description: The UDI primary JDBC URL used by most poolers (except Hikari, see below)

properties.name: org.techbd.udi.prime.jdbc.jdbcUrl
properties.description: The UDI primary JDBC URL for Hikari pooler (same as usual jdbc.url)

properties.name: org.techbd.udi.prime.jdbc.username
properties.description: The UDI primary JDBC URL's username

properties.name: org.techbd.udi.prime.jdbc.password
properties.description: The UDI primary JDBC URL's password

properties.name: org.techbd.service.baggage.user-agent.enable-sensitive
properties.description: Whether to send sensitive (potentially secret) content or 'baggage' from the server to the user agent (usually for development observability convenience)

properties.name: org.techbd.service.baggage.user-agent.exposure
properties.description: Whether to display content or 'baggage' from the server to the user agent (usually for development observability convenience)
